subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ben Francisco drove in a career-high four runs and the host Cleveland Indians stopped a 10-game losing streak Thursday with a 13-2 victory against Tampa Bay, the Rays’ fourth straight loss.
snippet: Ben Francisco drove in a career-high four runs and the host Cleveland Indians stopped a 10-game losing streak Thursday with a 13-2 victory against Tampa Bay, the Rays’ fourth straight loss.
